Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BSPSide

This enumeration is used to indicate which side of a BSP node a triangle is on.

Enumerator:
BSP_ON  Lies on the partitioning plane.
BSP_FRONT  Lies in front of the partitioning plane.
BSP_BACK  Lies behind the partitioning plane.
BSP_BOTH  Crosses over the partitioning plane.
